title: Senior Software Engineer - Device and Software Analytics
summary: How are Apple devices used and how can they be improved? What kinds of problems do our users experience? These are the kinds of questions the Software Engineering Data Analytics org answers.
description: We are looking for an expert Senior Software Engineer to join us in developing the applications, daemons and APIs which are responsible for many different types of on-device (iOS, macOS) data collection. This software ultimately lives on millions of devices worldwide and is the foundation for Apple Software Engineering's OS and Application data collection.
preferred_qualifications: Ideal candidate will have worked on operating system internals, kernel programming, multi threading, file handler operations
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $143,100 and $264,200, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location.
